data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of Atalophlebiinae (Insecta: Ephemeroptera: Leptophlebiidae) from Palni hills of the southern Western Ghats, India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Selvakumar, C., Sivaruban, T., Subramanian, K. A., Sivaramakrishnan, K. G. (2016): A new genus and species of Atalophlebiinae (Insecta: Ephemeroptera: Leptophlebiidae) from Palni hills of the southern Western Ghats, India. Zootaxa 4208 (4): 381-391, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.208362
